appearances.title: Poet Laureate Arthur Sze Delivers Inaugural Reading : CSPAN2 : January 12, 2026 1:45am-2:43am EST
appearances.snippet: here to help us celebrate, author is congresswoman teresa leger fernandez, who represents arthur's home district. congresswoman, welcome. grandniece not yes. and thank you, robert. and i'm looking out on it, if i may take a moment. i want to give a shout out to carol and my children went to school with their daughter, sara. so let's take a. so we gather here to celebrate a poet who has carried new mexico coast light across the world and who now brings it to our library. arthur once called the laureate ship a servant position. i love that because a poet at their truest is more than a writer. a poet is a seer, a truth teller, a heart rancher. if reporters write the first draft of history, three poets carve the first lines of truth. arthur, you have carved those lines to braid together cultures, landscape languages, and the fragile, everyday miracles that too often slip past unnoticed. poets like you are the master of the details. those small, dazzling, devastate and ancient, intimate details that make up this little oh, we call earth. your poems hold a small a speed of existence and show
